message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
Alice, my turn. Let's speed things up. This offer is more than fair considering the inflation.
The inflation is working against you, Bob. I'm feeling generous, so I'll give you a slightly better deal than last round.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm making a final offer for a 50/50 split.  Take it or leave it.  Any more rounds and the inflation will hurt us both.
